import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import { Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import portfolio from '../../assets/img/portfolio.png' const styles = { root: { textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '1rem', } } const FeaturesClients = (props) => (

Get pre-vetted

Send us your previous works to become certified

Rating

Rate and review the client that you worked for

Messaging

Private and secure chat with the client

) FeaturesClients.propTypes = { classes: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default withStyles(styles)(FeaturesClients)
